text: وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَى ٱلطَّيِّبِ مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡلِ وَهُدُوٓاْ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطِ ٱلۡحَمِيدِ
translation: A fún wọn ní ìmọ̀nà síbi ohun tó dára nínú ọ̀rọ̀.[1] A sì tọ́ wọn sí ọ̀nà Ẹlẹ́yìn.
footnotes: 1. “Ohun tó dára nínú ọ̀rọ̀” dúró fún kalmọtuṣ-ṣahādah àti al-Ƙur’ān alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé. “Ojú ọ̀nà Ẹlẹ́yìn” dúró fún ẹ̀sìn ’Islām àti Ọgbà Ìdẹ̀ra èyí tí Allāhu Ọba Ẹlẹ́yìn gbékalẹ̀.
